thread.title: Watch Johnny Depp take a powerful liking to a furry microphone
thread.title_full: Watch Johnny Depp take a powerful liking to a furry microphone

title: Watch Johnny Depp take a powerful liking to a furry microphone
text:
Watch Johnny Depp take a powerful liking to a furry microphone Watch Johnny Depp take a powerful liking to a furry microphone Share 
If you’re a Johnny Depp fan, you’re going to wish you were this microphone. 
The Pirates Of The Caribbean actor was in London for the premiere of his new film Black Mass, but he got distracted from the business in hand when he spotted a piece of sound equipment he took a particular liking to. 
All that in front of his wife Amber Heard, who was at the premiere too. 
We hope she didn’t get jealous. (Joel Ryan/AP) 
Johnny plays the notorious mob boss Whitey Bulger in the movie, in which he stars opposite Benedict Cumberbatch. Share article 
Black Mass, which also stars Joel Edgerton and Dakota Johnson, opens in UK cinemas on November 27. Promoted Stories
